alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 17 at 1:46PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN GLENNALLEN NORTH OF THE GLENN HIGHWAY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Along Moose Creek and in Glennallen north of the Glenn Highway * WHEN...Until 1100 AM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of Moose Creek and surrounding areas including in Glennallen. Localized flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas in Glennallen. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 138 PM AKDT, local law enforcement reported snowmelt in Glennallen North of the Glenn Highway. Minor flooding is ongoing and/or expected to continue, especially near Moose Creek. - In Glennallen North of the Glenn Highway is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood - If you live near or along Moose Creek, stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
